awasan adiyara wana hathwana adiyara wenuwen agramathya ranil wikramasinha, parlimenthu prathisanskarana saha janamadhya amathi gayantha karunathilaka, niyojya amathi karu paranawitharana, lekhawus sabhapathi kawan rathnayaka, karthru mandala adhyakshaka saman wagaaarachchi, shrilanka telikom samagame sabhapathi kumarasiri sirisena, ranganawedi punya hindeniya saha sarasawiya puwathpathe karthru anura gunarathna yana mahathma mahathmin ekwuha.

eya mahinda chinthana paà·Šrathipaththi paà·Šrakashanayeda (pitu anka 57) mahinda chinthana idiri dakmehida ( pitu anka 48) pahadiliwa sandahan kota thibe. 2010 wasara thula wishesha wadapiliwelak kaà·Šriyathmaka karana bawa ehi sadahan kara athath thawamath eya kadawunu poronduwak pamani.danata gasthu mitaraya aniwarya nokirima hethuwen mitaraya sawikota nathi thaà·Šriroda ratha riyaduro hithumathe wiwidha gasthu ayakaramin magingen mudal gasakathi. 2013 juli 31 anka 1821/31 darana gasat niwedanayenda ema wasarema okthombar 30 anka 1834/27 darana gasat niwedanayenda magi paà·Šrawahanaye yedena thaà·Šriroda ratha sandaha mitarayak sawi kirima aniwarya karune hithuwakkari gasthu aya kirim walakwaganu pinisaya.
